description: Situated within the Castel Pietra hotel, this pleasant restaurant with a combination of traditional and modern decor serves contemporary-style meat (often with a regional focus) and fish dishes which represent the different origins of the restaurant owners: the husband comes from Salento, while the wife is from the mountains.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
